#include <iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include <stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
 int h[200001];
 long long int engy[200001];
int main() {
	int n;
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin>>n;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>h[i];
		engy[i]=1000000001;
	}
	engy[0]=0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		for(int j=1;i+j<n;j*=2)
		{
			engy[i+j]=min(engy[i+j],engy[i]+abs(h[i+j]-h[i]));
		//	cout<<engy[n-1]<<endl;
		}
	}
	cout<<engy[n-1];
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
